name: Supermarket Shop Cash Register
description:
Get ready to run your personal superstore in Supermarket Grocery Store Cash Register in a realistic environment. In this beautifully designed kids game, you will be engaged in realistic supermarket environment as highly skilled cashier of the well-known grocery store. You would have always to shadow adult’s real life activities, how about managing cash on cash register as a professional cashier with highly advanced supermarket simulator in the realistic environment. Supermarket Grocery Store Cash Register is the specially designed educational game, which allows them to handle different customers with cash management or professional time management skills and improve their mathematical skills along with calculation abilities in the best educational way.


Supermarket Grocery Store Cash Register facilitates you to enter in a realistic superstore or grocery store of well-known realistic supermarket environment, where as a professional cashier you will have to handle multiple customers inquiries on cash register keeping utilizing supermarket simulator and superstore simulator with optimized payment receiving preferences. So what are you waiting for download this specifically designed money management simulation game and test your calculating skills with realistic simulation?

Silent Features:

- Realistic colorful with realistic superstore environment!
- High engaging cash register simulation based levels!
- Multiple payments receiving methodologies like cash, credit card or NFC & more!
- Custom interface specifically designed for enhancing kids mathematical skills!
- Multiple racks providing options to handle different items!
- Get rewards on the satisfying customer with time management simulation!
